column4: "for me; but it should fit Conn nicely; and the battle-axe I carry would suit Shagga"
"replied.  The huge one; Shagga; laughed first and loudest. The others seemed less amused. "Conn"
" Shagga gave a roar of anger and clashed club against axe. Jaggot poked at Tyrion"
""Best for Tyrion son of Tywin;" said Ulf; who spoke for the Moon Brothers.  Shagga"
""Best for Tyrion son of Tywin;" said Ulf; who spoke for the Moon Brothers.  Shagga"

"become such friends. But as you will. You shall ride with me; and Shagga and Conn"
"me; and Shagga and Conn for the Stone Crows; Ulf for the Moon Brothers; and Timett"
"horses. Shagga did not want to give his up. "The lad won't steal your mare;" Tyrion"
""What; no goats?" Tyrion said; taking a bite of cheese.  The other clansmen followed Shagga"
"taking a bite of cheese.  The other clansmen followed Shagga into the common room; Bronn"
"The other clansmen followed Shagga into the common room; Bronn with them. The sellsword gave Tyrion"
"they take fifty more." Tyrion waddled away from her. "This is Conn son of Coratt. Shagga"

"strongholds; my lords?"  "Horses;" said Shagga.  "A promise of silk and steel;" said Timett"
"said Shagga.  "A promise of silk and steel;" said Timett son of Timett.  Tyrion"
"the Stone Crows have been there first;" Conn declared hotly. "We ride as well."  "Shagga"
"black steel ones with twin crescent blades."  "Shagga likes to kill with either hand;" Tyrion"
"back."  "Shagga is of the opinion that three axes are even better than two." Tyrion"
"they were hoping to get the sausage back; I couldn't say. Bronn managed to keep Shagga"
"cock; which was fortunate; but even so Ulf is demanding blood money; which Conn and Shagga"
"and galloped past him; and Shagga howled and followed. The clansmen charged after them; leaving Tyrion"
"last red breath; the Mountain rose untouched; laying about him with his two-handed greatsword.  Shagga"
"was crumbling; the northerners reeling back under the impact of the mounted assault. Tyrion saw Shagga"
"his Moon Brothers sprawled around him. Shagga was slumped beneath a tree; riddled with arrows; Conn"
"him. Shagga was slumped beneath a tree; riddled with arrows; Conn's head in his lap. Tyrion"
"Conn's head in his lap. Tyrion thought they were both dead; but as he dismounted; Shagga"
"both dead; but as he dismounted; Shagga opened his eyes and said; "They have killed Conn"
"red stain over his breast; where the spear thrust had killed him. When Bronn pulled Shagga"
"they were yanking arrows out of Shagga; and showed them four ears she had taken. Timett"
"women; they may take what they want and burn the rest."  "Telling Shagga and Timett"
""Telling Shagga and Timett how to pillage is like telling a rooster how to crow;" Tyrion"
